definitions.definition: A mercenary soldier ; a freebooter ; specifically , a mercenary who travelled illegally in an organized group from the United States to a country in Central America or the Spanish West Indies in the mid-19th century seeking economic and political benefits through armed force .
A tactic (such as giving long, often irrelevant speeches ) employed to delay the proceedings of, or the making of a decision by, a legislative body, particularly the United States Senate .
A member of a legislative body causing such an obstruction .

main_definition: ( historical ) A mercenary soldier ; a freebooter ; specifically , a mercenary who travelled illegally in an organized group from the United States to a country in Central America or the Spanish West Indies in the mid-19th century seeking economic and political benefits through armed force .
secondary_definitions: ( US politics ) A tactic (such as giving long, often irrelevant speeches ) employed to delay the proceedings of, or the making of a decision by, a legislative body, particularly the United States Senate .
( US politics ) A member of a legislative body causing such an obstruction .
